segment.source: Testing a Driver
segment.target: Testing a Driver

segment.source: The WDK adds a driver testing interface to Visual Studio that allows you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a remote test computer on your network.
segment.target: The WDK adds a driver testing interface to Visual Studio that allows you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a remote test computer on your network.

segment.source: The WDK also provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test features and functions of your driver.
segment.target: The WDK also provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test features and functions of your driver.

segment.source: You can also write customize or write your own driver tests using the Driver Test Template in Visual Studio.
segment.target: You can also write customize or write your own driver tests using the Driver Test Template in Visual Studio.

segment.source: Video Demonstration
segment.target: Video Demonstration

segment.source: This video demonstrates the how to run driver-related tests in a test group.
segment.target: This video demonstrates the how to run driver-related tests in a test group.

segment.source: This section describes some strategies for testing driver, and information about how you select and configure a remote computer to use for testing.
segment.target: This section describes some strategies for testing driver, and information about how you select and configure a remote computer to use for testing.

segment.source: To prepare a driver for public distribution, you should run the Windows Hardware Certification Kit (HCK).
segment.target: To prepare a driver for public distribution, you should run the Windows Hardware Certification Kit (HCK).

segment.source: For information about the Windows Certification program and how to obtain the HCK, see Windows Hardware Certification Program.
segment.target: For information about the Windows Certification program and how to obtain the HCK, see Windows Hardware Certification Program.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Tips for testing drivers during development
segment.target: Tips for testing drivers during development

segment.source: When should you start testing? As soon as you have the requirements for your driver, you can begin to design test cases to test that the critical requirements have been implemented.
segment.target: When should you start testing? As soon as you have the requirements for your driver, you can begin to design test cases to test that the critical requirements have been implemented.

segment.source: Studies show that finding and fixing defects in code becomes more expensive the longer the defects remain in the code.
segment.target: Studies show that finding and fixing defects in code becomes more expensive the longer the defects remain in the code.

segment.source: Finding and fixing defects early in the development cycle is less costly and disruptive than finding defects after the code has been released and distributed.
segment.target: Finding and fixing defects early in the development cycle is less costly and disruptive than finding defects after the code has been released and distributed.

segment.source: Creating your test cases early can also help you find problems in your design.
segment.target: Creating your test cases early can also help you find problems in your design.

segment.source: How to test a driver at runtime using Visual Studio
segment.target: How to test a driver at runtime using Visual Studio

segment.source: The WDK extensions to Visual Studio provide a device testing interface that enables you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a test computer on your network.
segment.target: The WDK extensions to Visual Studio provide a device testing interface that enables you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a test computer on your network.

segment.source: The WDK provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test the features and functions of your driver.
segment.target: The WDK provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test the features and functions of your driver.

segment.source: How to write a driver test using a Driver Test template
segment.target: How to write a driver test using a Driver Test template

segment.source: You can use the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) for Windows 8 to create your own driver tests or to customize some of the tests that are provided.
segment.target: You can use the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) for Windows 8 to create your own driver tests or to customize some of the tests that are provided.

segment.source: You can deploy the tests that you create to remote test computers using the driver testing framework that the WDK provides for Microsoft Visual Studio Ultimate 2012.
segment.target: You can deploy the tests that you create to remote test computers using the driver testing framework that the WDK provides for Microsoft Visual Studio Ultimate 2012.
